FtpExecute.select_account: SELECT id, name, password FROM accounts WHERE name=:name
FtpExecute.select_all_files: SELECT f.id, f.name, f.modified, a.name AS owner FROM files f JOIN accounts a ON a.id = f.id_account AND f.id_directory=:parent
FtpExecute.select_file: SELECT f.id, f.name, f.modified, a.name AS owner FROM files f JOIN accounts a ON a.id = f.id_account WHERE f.name = :name AND f.id_directory = :parent
